item.title: [TLDR] GRUB, dracut, systemd and Bootup Process
item.description: BIOS POST: issues interrupt INT13H to find boot sectors on bootable device Boot Loaders (LILO / GRUB / GRUB2): loads Linux Kernel into memory and running stage1: runs bootstrap code that loaded by BIOS POST in Master Boot Record (MBR) stage1 does not understand file system, the only purpose of stage1 is to locate and load stage1.5 stage2: locates the stage 2 files in the /boot filesystem and load the needed drivers.
